How to recognize: plain one color, minimal design, collared necks, covered necks
too many colors, bold letters, heavy sparkling jewellery, deep necks, exposed shoulders
plain one color, tie, collared necks
too many colors, bold letters, exposed hands, jewellery

Wall with different colored posters, Big bold letters, dark room, lighting behind the person
no hair on face other than forehead, ponytails, braids
Hair on face, messy bun, too many contrasting accessories on hair
Plain face where all features can be seen properly, no heavy contrasting makeup
Different colours used for eyeshadow, lipstick, extremely long eyelashes and eyeliners
